Blog.post: well i officially miss snowboarding. i am such a loser i miss snowboarding so much that i slept with my snowboard last night. but i had a cool dream, i was in this awesome house with all of my closest friends and then we saw a crack in the ceiling and we looked in it and we saw people in the attic and then we heard loud music start to play so i went up there and one of my favorite bands was playing up there (strike anywhere). it was sweet.

by the way i totally love music i think it is incredible and you might think i am crazy but i think that music could be a tool to bring this world to peace because who doesnt like music if there is something that everyone can agree on then there should be hope for world peace but anyway thats my farfetched idea about music. my favorite bands right now are Thursday, Thrice, Cursive, Fairweather, Transplants, Coheed&Cambria, The Faint, Modest Mouse, Mates of State, Saves the Day, At the Drive In, Every Time I Die, Stretch Arm Strong, Give Up the Ghost, Rise Against, Bright Eyes, Death Cab for Cutie, Boy Sets Fire, Strike Anywhere, Q & Not U, The Blood Brothers, Desaparacedos, Atmosphere, Eyedea & Abilities, Outkast, The Rise, The Bronx, Funeral For a Friend, Paint it Black, A Billion Ernies, and Rx Bandits.

hello i still dont understand this blog thing, but lets see ill share my thoughts. i had a awesome day on sunday i must say. i rode the city bus all around and i saw a show that was swell then i had the best sub sandwhich of my life and the best part of it was that i got to spend it with the coolest girl on this earth (C.S.). yeah thats right Claire you the coolest if ya ever read this. well today i went dumpster diving and that was fun me and my friend went to collect mountain dew points to get an x box we got 25 point for a grand total of 381 yup almost there. I am so pissed off because i am going to miss the blood brothers this friday cause i am going up to my cabin but whatever cause my cabin kicks a**. signing off.

Hi this is my blog. I dont really understand this whole blogging experience. I really just dont get the point of it, but a good friend of mine told me I should get one. So I did. I don't even know what this really is so whatever here i go. umm.... yeah okay bye.

I just have to give my aunt and uncle some props cause they care about me so much that they took the time to search my name on google and then they found my blog and now they know all about me ;) P.S. I love you Kim and Joe

HA HA HA HA HA HA HA Ha HA. wowo i miss theater teater tater tter ter tr t an all me friends that i havent seen although i did see some chums yeah jons home omg i totally want to throw a killer party with all o f my friends before this summer i s over yall are invited you know who you are ooooooooo it could be a dance party even though i dont know how to dance. i can pretend. ? thanks. umm i am really not tired because i took a four hour nap today or something like that. oh thank you mr. anderson i can type. oooo i go to colorado on friday boy that willl be swell. oh and if any of you that read this and know me and drink mountain dew with the orange caps or boxes with points on the inside i will gladly take them off your hands for you cause i am saving up to get an xbox. why no one will probably read this or the one below because there is too many words and people dont want to read lame crap about spencers sorry little life but props to anyone who actually does. and if you ever want to know what spencer thinks about at 12:55 when he is really hyper read this over and over again yuppy like a puppy. gooooooooo matt you dog you i am happy for you yea matt and janelle sittin' in a tree k i s s i n g; first comes the love; then comes the marriage; then comes the baby *wink wink* in the baby carriage; but thats not all then ya find the baby drinking alchol or playing racquettball or soccor or quiddich or l. oooooooo and at my party we can play wink oh i miss wink wink is fun. does anyone want to have a wink tournament? he he bye!@#$%^&*()_

ok so here is the situation; I really really like this one girl but i am pretty sure she doesnt like me the way i like her. well i really want a girlfriend but i am sort of waiting to find out if this girl likes me cause i dont want to ruin anything we might possibly have if she does end up liking me but i also want a girlfriend really really badly. so any helpful suggestions would be greatly appreciated. Blah Blah Blah shut up spencer oh and by the way farenheit 9/11 was most excellent and everyone should see it and everyone who can vote needs to to get that creep out of office.
